sys_template.name: CGI open
sys_template.template: aggregate=1^collect_breakdown_matrix=true^collect_records=true^cube=a8cb925497716110e1debee3f153af00^default_chart_type=line^description=Number of incidents not solved is measured daily as unit #. The goal for this indicator is to minimize It is the count on data source Incidents.Closed, which is using the table: incident with the following conditions: Incident state = Closed .and. Closed on Today Additional conditions: Close code = Not Solved (Not Reproducible) .or. Close code = Not Solved (Too Costly)^direction=2^display=false^forecast_base_type=1^forecast_method=1^forecast_periods=2^key=false^override_periods=false^precision=0^render_continuous_lines=false^role_override=true^scores_format=kMGTPE^show_realtime_score=false^unit=17b365e2d7320100ba986f14ce6103ad^visible_to=2^EQ
